thread.title: Seattle Mariners say they have fired manager Lloyd McClendon

title: Seattle Mariners say they have fired manager Lloyd McClendon
text:
Updated: 9:47 a.m. Friday, Oct. 9, 2015 | Posted: 9:47 a.m. Friday, Oct. 9, 2015 Seattle Mariners say they have fired manager Lloyd McClendon Sponsored Links 
Seattle Mariners say they have fired manager Lloyd McClendon.
